step.datasource: UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_IC_RMAs] SET Updated = 1, runid = '%runid%', Datechanged = GETDATE() --WHERE ID in (SELECT MIN(ID) FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_IC_RMAs] WHERE updated = 0 --and runid is null

/****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS ******/
SELECT TOP 10 6034 AS [Type] ,r.[CID] AS [FreeIntField_03] ,R.[Reason] AS [Description]
,r.[Accountno] AS [FreeIntField_02] ,c.[cmp_wwn] AS [CustomerID]
,r.[ContactPerson] AS [ReferenceNumber] ,cp.[cnt_id] AS [CustomerContactID]
,LEFT(r.[Company],60) AS [FreeTextField_02] ,LEFT(r.[Email],60) AS [FreeTextField_10] ,r.[CDate] AS [StartDate]
,LEFT(r.[ArticleNo1],60) AS [FreeTextField_12] ,i1.[Itemcode] AS [ItemCode] ,LEFT(r.[SerialNo1],60) AS [OpportunityStage] ,r.[Quantity1] AS [ItemCount] ,LEFT(r.[State1],60) AS [FreeTextField_05]
,LEFT(r.[ArticleNo2],60) AS [FreeTextField_08] ,i2.[Itemcode] AS [ItemCode_2] ,LEFT(r.[SerialNo2],60) AS [ProcessNumber] ,r.[Quantity2] AS [ItemCount_2] ,LEFT(r.[State2],60) AS [FreeTextField_04]
,r.[OrderNo] AS [FreeIntField_04] ,r.[InvoiceNo] AS [FreeIntField_01] ,r.[Description] + CASE WHEN ISNULL(r.SerialNo1,'') != '' THEN '
[ABEI Information ' + CONVERT(Varchar,getdate(),20) + '] Serialnumber ' + ISNULL(r.SerialNo1,'') + CASE WHEN (in1.itemcode IS NULL) THEN ' is not found in db 400.' ELSE ' belongs to ' + ISNULL(in1.ItemCode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,'') + '.' + CASE WHEN (gb1.datum IS NULL) THEN ' No sales information found.' ELSE ' Sold on ' + ISNULL(CONVERT(Varchar,gb1.datum,105),'') + ' on order ' + ISNULL(gb1.project,'') + ' with invoice ' + ISNULL(gb1.faktuurnr,'') + ' to ' + ISNULL(gb1.oms25,'') + '.' END END ELSE '' END + CASE WHEN ISNULL(r.SerialNo2,'') != '' THEN '
[ABEI Information ' + CONVERT(Varchar,getdate(),20) + '] Serialnumber ' + ISNULL(r.SerialNo2,'') + CASE WHEN (in2.itemcode IS NULL) THEN ' is not found in db 400.' ELSE ' belongs to ' + ISNULL(in2.ItemCode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,'') + '.' + CASE WHEN (gb2.datum IS NULL) THEN ' No sales information found.' ELSE ' Sold on ' + ISNULL(CONVERT(Varchar,gb2.datum,105),'') + ' on order ' + ISNULL(gb2.project,'') + ' with invoice ' + ISNULL(gb2.faktuurnr,'') + ' to ' + ISNULL(gb2.oms25,'') + '.' END END ELSE '' END AS [RequestComments] ,r.[ShipmentDate] AS [FreeDateField_02]
,LEFT(r.[Failure],60) AS [FreeTextField_14] ,LEFT(r.[FailureDescription],60) AS [FreeTextField_15] ,LEFT(r.[Reason],60) AS [FreeTextField_09] ,LEFT(r.[OptionalText],60) AS [FreeTextField_13]
FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_IC_RMAs] r LEFT OUTER JOIN [orlaco].[dbo].[cicmpy] c with (NOLOCK) on r.[Accountno] != 0 AND c.[cmp_code] = r.[Accountno] and c.cmp_type != 'E' LEFT OUTER JOIN [orlaco].[dbo].[cicntp] cp with (NOLOCK) on cp.[cmp_wwn] = c.[cmp_wwn] AND cp.[FullName] = r.[ContactPerson] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT LEFT OUTER JOIN [orlaco].[dbo].[Items] i1 with (NOLOCK) on i1.Itemcode = r.ArticleNo1 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT LEFT OUTER JOIN [orlaco].[dbo].[Items] i2 with (NOLOCK) on i2.Itemcode = r.ArticleNo2 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT LEFT OUTER JOIN [400].[dbo].[ItemNumbers] in1 with (NOLOCK) on in1.Number = r.SerialNo1 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT LEFT OUTER JOIN [400].[dbo].[ItemNumbers] in2 with (NOLOCK) on in2.Number = r.SerialNo2 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT LEFT OUTER JOIN (select TOP 1 datum, project, faktuurnr, oms25, bkstnr_sub, docnumber, facode from [400]..gbkmut gb with (NOLOCK) where reknr = ' 8400' and transtype = 'N' and transsubtype = 'K' ORDER BY datum desc) gb1 on gb1.facode = r.SerialNo1 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT LEFT OUTER JOIN (select TOP 1 datum, project, faktuurnr, oms25, bkstnr_sub, docnumber, facode from [400]..gbkmut gb with (NOLOCK) where reknr = ' 8400' and transtype = 'N' and transsubtype = 'K' ORDER BY datum desc) gb2 on gb2.facode = r.SerialNo2 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT WHERE Updated = 1 and RunId = '%runid%'
ORDER BY r.CID

UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_IC_RMAs] SET Updated = 2, Datechanged = GETDATE(), HID = r.HID FROM [orlaco].dbo.absences r with (NOLOCK) where r.type = 6034 and r.freeIntField_03 = CID AND updated = 1 --and runid = '%runid%'

select TOP 10 6035 AS [Type] ,w.[ID] AS [RelatedRequestID] ,w.[CustomerID] AS [CustomerID] ,w.[CustomerContactID] AS [CustomerContactID] ,w.[ProjectNumber] AS [ProjectNumber] ,w.[Description] AS [Description] ,w.[Startdate] AS [Startdate] ,DATEADD(m, 2, w.[Startdate]) AS [FreeDateField_02] -- Return no later than
,w.[Itemcode] AS [Itemcode] ,w.[OpportunityStage] AS [FreeTextField_04] -- serial number 1 ,w.[ItemCount] AS [ItemCount] ,w.[FreeTextField_05] AS [FreeTextField_07] -- state of part 1
,w.[Itemcode_2] AS [Itemcode_2] ,w.[ProcessNumber] AS [FreeTextField_08] -- serial number 2 ,w.[ItemCount_2] AS [ItemCount_2] ,w.[FreeTextField_04] AS [FreeTextField_03] -- state of part 2
,w.[FreeTextField_09] AS [FreeTextField_06] -- Reason for returning ,w.[FreeIntField_04] AS [ReferenceNumber] -- Customer PO ,w.[FreeIntField_01] AS [FreeIntField_03] -- Invoice number ,w.RequestComments -- Report description
from [orlaco].[dbo].[absences] w with (NOLOCK) where [Type] = 6034 AND [Status] = 3 AND [ID] NOT IN (SELECT RelatedRequestID from [orlaco].[dbo].[absences] w with (NOLOCK) where [Type] = 6035 AND RelatedRequestID IS NOT NULL)
SELECT TOP 10 ID, HID, 1 as [Status] FROM absences with (NOLOCK) where type = 6035 and status = 0 and relatedrequestid is not null
step.stepname: --disabled -- Update Status for RMA with WebRMA

step.datasource: SELECT TOP 10 wa.ID, wa.HID, ra.ID as relatedrequestid FROM absences wa with (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN absences ra with (NOLOCK) on ra.relatedrequestid = wa.id where wa.type = 6034 and ra.type = 6035 and wa.relatedrequestid is null
step.stepname: Write RMA request ID to WEB RMA

step.datasource: select a.HID, a.StartDate, ra.fullname AS ApprovedBy, a.Approved, ISNULL(ra.mail, 'm.velthoven@orlaco.com') as Email, rh.fullname AS RejectedBy, a.Rejected from [orlaco]..Absences a with (NOLOCK) LEFT join [orlaco]..humres ra with (NOLOCK) on ra.res_id = a.Approver LEFT join [orlaco]..humres rh with (NOLOCK) on rh.res_id = a.RejectedBy where (a.Type = 6034 OR a.type = 6035) and a.Status = 2 and a.Approver != 0 AND a.Rejected > DATEADD(HOUR, -1, GETDATE())
step.contentbody:
Dear %ApprovedBy%,

The RMA %HID% with startdate %StartDate% is rejected on %Rejected% by %RejectedBy%.

Please take care of this RMA.

Kind regards,

Your automated ABEI bot
